faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How do I pay for the essentials or premium plan?
faq.a1: You can pay with a credit card or via net banking (if you're in United States). We will renew your subscription automatically at the end of every billing cycle.
faq.q2: Can I cancel my subscription at any time?
faq.a2: Yes, you can cancel your plan anytime. Your subscription benefits continue until the end of your current billing period.
faq.q3: How do I embed the popup on my website?
faq.a3: After customizing your modal, click 'Get your Code' to generate the embed script. Copy and paste it before the closing </body> tag of your website.
faq.q4: How will adding new users to our team be billed?
faq.a4: New users are added to your plan at a prorated rate based on the remaining days in your billing cycle.
faq.q5: Can I customize the modal design after embedding?
faq.a5: Yes! Simply return to the generator, make your changes, and update the embed code on your website.
faq.q6: Do the modals work on mobile devices?
faq.a6: Absolutely. All our modal templates are fully responsive and work perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
